General.Name: Fsilon Furnishing and Construction Materials Corp
General.Description: Fsilon Furnishing and Construction Materials Corporation engages in the research and development, production, and sale of integrated ceiling, integrated wall, and other products in Russia, East Asia, Southeast Asia, and internationally. It offers ceiling electrical appliances, background wall products, decorative products, living room, bedroom, bathroom ceiling, and integrated ceiling kitchen products, as well as balcony system and tooling products. The company was founded in 2007 and is based in Jiaxing, China. Fsilon Furnishing and Construction Materials Corporation is a subsidiary of French Lions Dragon Investment Holdings Co., Ltd.
